snippet: During a gathering in New Hampshire, an energized, confident bench of 19 Republicans took turns taking apart Hillary Rodham Clinton or competing with her on policy ideas.
abstract: Republican presidential candidates and possible contenders gather at two-day event in Nashua, NH, and spend much of their time attacking record of Hillary Rodham Clinton, who is running for Democratic nomination in 2016; event allows 19 hopefuls to showcase their strategy and talents, and serves also to illustrate breadth of of Republican field.

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY and JONATHAN MARTIN

lead_paragraph: During a gathering in New Hampshire, an energized, confident bench of 19 Republicans took turns taking apart Hillary Rodham Clinton or competing with her on policy ideas.

headline.main: At Republican Gathering, All Talk Is of Hillary Clinton (None of It Is Good)
headline.print_headline: At Republican Gathering, All Talk Is of Clinton (None of It Is Good)
